page.title: 03BUCHANAN SCHOOL
page.content: In the Milton of Buchanan the old school used to be over the Balmaha Road,in the school house. There used to be 4 teachers. Before they used the school house they used the Memorial Hall as a school. When the primary school was over in the school house there used to be a high school where the primary school is now but there is only a general purpose room and a kitchen. The toilets were outside next to the high school. All the primary children had to cross the road to go to the toilet. Mrs Gilmour used to be the lollipop lady but now she is the cook. The road was getting very busy and it was very dangerous for the children to cross . The road is so busy because Loch Lomond is just up the road,and all the tourists go there. All the high school children went to Balfron High School.
